about_the_game:
Discover the world of Sulky Manager through harness races, 3D hippodromes, 3D Isle (ranch) and challenge yourself to win the Harness Racing trophies!
Take over the management of a stable and launch yourself into financial and competitive challenges. Your actions will determine the success of your races.
With 5 country, many jockeys and hundred horses, immerse yourself in the equestrian world. Buy the best horses, produce your foals, train then, manage your own stable and find your success in a multiplayer ranking.
With a gaming that combines strategy and competition, find yourself at the heart of a passion.


  • Built your avatar and interact with other Pnj avatar in your ranch
  • Communicate with your employer and meet the objectives to keep your job
  • Win trophies, xp, rank and money by winning races
  • Make the best times and become the best faster player in a ranking fast table multiplayer.
  • Take into account the weather that impacts the horses' abilities and week calendar
  • Progress through the levels to unlock races and move up in the categories from 3 to 1
  • Each horse has bonuses linked to the weather, the terrain, the racecourse and its nationality and his training calendar.
  • Increase your winnings through the lottery if you finish in the top 3.
  • Earn training points and distribute them in the characteristics of your horse and manager.
  • Optimize the purchase of your horses according to the races unblocked or produce your foals
  • Try to win the International best race GR 1 which will multiply your winnings.
  • Full animation isle (ship, plane, car, animals...), training horse, foals, 3D avatar facial
  • Building your own ranch with facility
detailed_description:
Discover the world of Sulky Manager through harness races, 3D hippodromes, 3D Isle (ranch) and challenge yourself to win the Harness Racing trophies!
Take over the management of a stable and launch yourself into financial and competitive challenges. Your actions will determine the success of your races.
With 5 country, many jockeys and hundred horses, immerse yourself in the equestrian world. Buy the best horses, produce your foals, train then, manage your own stable and find your success in a multiplayer ranking.
With a gaming that combines strategy and competition, find yourself at the heart of a passion.


  • Built your avatar and interact with other Pnj avatar in your ranch
  • Communicate with your employer and meet the objectives to keep your job
  • Win trophies, xp, rank and money by winning races
  • Make the best times and become the best faster player in a ranking fast table multiplayer.
  • Take into account the weather that impacts the horses' abilities and week calendar
  • Progress through the levels to unlock races and move up in the categories from 3 to 1
  • Each horse has bonuses linked to the weather, the terrain, the racecourse and its nationality and his training calendar.
  • Increase your winnings through the lottery if you finish in the top 3.
  • Earn training points and distribute them in the characteristics of your horse and manager.
  • Optimize the purchase of your horses according to the races unblocked or produce your foals
  • Try to win the International best race GR 1 which will multiply your winnings.
  • Full animation isle (ship, plane, car, animals...), training horse, foals, 3D avatar facial
  • Building your own ranch with facility
name: Sulky Manager

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: Medium to up
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Discover the equestrian world through harness racing in many 3D hippodromes and challenge yourself to win trophies and position in multiplayer ranking ! Produce your foals and train your horses in your ranch.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain
